General.Name: Prinsiri Public Company Limited
General.Description: Prinsiri Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, lease, and sale of real estate properties. The company's properties include townhomes, single houses, and condominiums. It also provides construction distributor and contractor services, as well as food service in restaurants and food shops. In addition, the company engages in the generation and distribution of electricity from solar cells and alternative energy. Prinsiri Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
